long_description: These casual socks for sandal-wearing Saturdays supply well-known SmartWool(R) performance to keep your feet dry and comfortable. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. Stretch fibers from top to toe deliver all-day comfort. Soft comfort cuff doesn't bind yet offers stay-up power. Tapered, flat-looped toe box for a smooth fit with no irritation. Machine wash and dry. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These casual socks for sandal-wearing Saturdays supply well-known SmartWool(R) performance to keep your feet dry and comfortable.
